text: Igor Dmitrievich Kurnosov (; 30 May 1985 - 8 August 2013) was a Russian chess grandmaster. In 2008, he won the Arctic Chess Challenge. He was also the winner of 2008/9 Hastings Masters tournament. Kurnosov died after he was hit by a car in the early hours of 8 August 2013 in his hometown of Chelyabinsk. He was aged 28. ==References== ==Other websites== * Igor Kurnosov at Chess Games Category:1985 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Russian chess players Category:Road accident deaths Category:People from Chelyabinsk Oblast
title: Igor Kurnosov
